p: Protein sequences were downloaded from the UniProt database ( https://www.uniprot.org/) with the following accession numbers: Gaba alpha subunit, P14867 d-alanyl- d-alanine carboxypeptidase Q75Y35, Angiotensin-converting enzyme P12821, HIV 1 Integrase Q7ZJM1, 30S ribosomal protein S9 P0A7X3, Vasopressin V2 receptor P30518. The FASTA COVID-19 M pro sequence was downloaded from RCSB, PDB ID 6LU7 and the corresponding IS was calculated. A set of 1490 approved Drugbank [ 12] drugs with corresponding SMILES was subjected to IS and CS calculation with M pro. All calculations were carried out using our in-house software.
